com.google.code.jscep.content
Interface ScepContentHandler<T>

Type Parameters:
T - the content that is handled by the implementation of this interface.
All Known Implementing Classes:
CaCapabilitiesContentHandler, CaCertificateContentHandler, CertRepContentHandler, NextCaCertificateContentHandler
public interface ScepContentHandler<T>

This interface represents a mechanism for handling specific SCEP content.

Method Detail

getContent

T getContent(InputStream in,
             String mimeType)
             throws IOException
Read and interpret the content from the input stream.

Parameters:
in - the input stream containing the content.
mimeType - the type of the input stream.
Returns:
the content in a usage form.
Throws:
IOException - if any I/O error occurs.
